name: Kindred Group plc
goal:
ensure that we provide premium digital gambling and digital contents services to registered EU adult consumers and make sure that we optimize consumer surplus by offering more value for money and premium customer digital entertainment experience.

we want to achieve that objective by using innovative technology and build on trust.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: consumer protection, digital single market, e-commerce, gdpr and data protection
